title: 5月1日勞動節本校垃圾車暫停清運一日。On Labor Day, May 1, garbage trucks will be suspended for one day.
author: 許智翔
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處環境保護組 - 許智翔 - cocco3746@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906399
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 5月1日勞動節本校垃圾車暫停清運一日。On Labor Day, May 1, garbage trucks will be suspended for one day.
日期： Fri, 26 Apr 2024 08:17:08 +0800

ㄧ、配合五一勞動節本校垃圾車清運同仁放假，5月1日(星期三)將暫停清運一日。
二、停收垃圾期間，請勿將垃圾棄置室外，不便之處尚請見諒。 

總務處環境保護組 敬啟
1. In conjunction with the Labor Day holiday, garbage truck service will be suspended for one day on May 1 (Wednesday).
2. When garbage truck service is closed, please do not throw garbage outdoors. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Sincerely, Environmental Protection Group, General Affairs Office
